languages.text: "Нам нужно попасть наверх! Просто поверьте мне — вы отыщете Вольного Торговца наверху! Прикажите пилоту шаттла поднять нас — меня он не послушает!"
"We need to get upstairs! Just trust me on this: you will find the Rogue Trader at the top! Tell the shuttle pilot to take us there — he won't listen to me!"
languages.original_text: "Нам нужно попасть наверх! Просто поверьте мне — вы отыщете Вольного Торговца наверху! Прикажите пилоту шаттла поднять нас — меня он не послушает!"

traits.locale_text: "We need to get upstairs! Just trust me — you'll find the Rogue Trader at the top! Tell the shuttle pilot to take us up there — he won't listen to me!"
"We need to get upstairs! Just trust me on this: you will find the Rogue Trader at the top! Tell the shuttle pilot to take us there — he won't listen to me!"
"We need to get upstairs! Just trust me — you'll find the Rogue Trader at the top!"
"We need to get upstairs! Just trust me on this: you will find the Rogue Trader at the top! Tell the shuttle pilot to take us there — he won't listen to me!"
"We need to get upstairs! Just trust me on this: you will find the Rogue Trader at the top! Tell the shuttle pilot to take us there — he won't listen to me!"
"We need to get upstairs! Just trust me — you'll find the Rogue Trader at the top! Tell the shuttle pilot to take us up there — he won't listen to me!"
"We need to get upstairs! Just trust me on this: you will find the Rogue Trader at the top! Tell the shuttle pilot to take us there — he won't listen to me!"

languages.text: “我们必须赶紧上楼！相信我，行商浪人就在塔顶！你得告诉穿梭机驾驶员，让他带我们过去！我可使唤不动他！”
languages.original_text: "We need to get upstairs! Just trust me on this: you will find the Rogue Trader at the top! Tell the shuttle pilot to take us there — he won't listen to me!"

traits.locale_text: “我们必须赶紧上楼！相信我，行商浪人就在塔顶！你得告诉穿梭机驾驶员，让他带我们过去！我可使唤不动他！”

languages.text: «¡Tenemos que llegar al piso de arriba! Confíen en mí, ¡encontrarán a{rt_mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente ahí arriba! Pidan al piloto de la lanzadera que nos lleve, ¡a mí no me hace caso!».
languages.original_text: "We need to get upstairs! Just trust me on this: you will find the Rogue Trader at the top! Tell the shuttle pilot to take us there — he won't listen to me!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Tenemos que llegar al piso de arriba! Confíen en mí, ¡encontrarán a{rt_mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente ahí arriba! Pidan al piloto de la lanzadera que nos lleve, ¡a mí no me hace caso!».

languages.text: "Yukarı çıkmalıyız! Bana güvenin, Hür Tacir'i tepede bulacaksınız! Mekik pilotuna söyleyin, bizi yukarı çıkarsın. Beni dinlemiyor!"
languages.original_text: "We need to get upstairs! Just trust me on this: you will find the Rogue Trader at the top! Tell the shuttle pilot to take us there — he won't listen to me!"

traits.locale_text: "Yukarı çıkmalıyız! Bana güvenin, Hür Tacir'i tepede bulacaksınız! Mekik pilotuna söyleyin, bizi yukarı çıkarsın. Beni dinlemiyor!"

languages.text: 「上の階に行かなければならない！これは信じてくれ。ローグトレーダーはきっと最上階にいる！シャトルのパイロットに、そこへ向かうよう伝えてくれ—{rt_mf|俺|私}の言うことには耳を貸さないんだ！」
languages.original_text: "We need to get upstairs! Just trust me on this: you will find the Rogue Trader at the top! Tell the shuttle pilot to take us there — he won't listen to me!"

traits.locale_text: 「上の階に行かなければならない！これは信じてくれ。ローグトレーダーはきっと最上階にいる！シャトルのパイロットに、そこへ向かうよう伝えてくれ—{rt_mf|俺|私}の言うことには耳を貸さないんだ！」

languages.text: « Nous devons monter ! Faites-moi confiance ! Vous trouverez {rt_mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} tout en haut ! Dites au pilote de nous y emmener, il refuse de m'écouter ! »
languages.original_text: "We need to get upstairs! Just trust me on this: you will find the Rogue Trader at the top! Tell the shuttle pilot to take us there — he won't listen to me!"

traits.locale_text: « Nous devons monter ! Faites-moi confiance ! Vous trouverez {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} tout en haut ! Dites au pilote de nous y emmener, il refuse de m'écouter ! »

languages.text: "Wir müssen nach oben gehen! Vertraut mir einfach: Ihr findet {rt_mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} oben! Sagt dem Piloten des Shuttles, er soll uns hinbringen ... auf mich wird er nicht hören!
languages.original_text: "We need to get upstairs! Just trust me on this: you will find the Rogue Trader at the top! Tell the shuttle pilot to take us there — he won't listen to me!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir müssen nach oben gehen! Vertraut mir einfach: Ihr findet {rt_mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} oben! Sagt dem Piloten des Shuttles, er soll uns hinbringen ... auf mich wird er nicht hören!
